description: This file is a Python source file defining a logger creation function that wraps an external logging module. It manages import paths and provides a single function for creating log objects.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Creates and returns a logger object by invoking the external Log class with provided arguments.
